key.name: planets-char
key.summary: Display planet symbols as UTF-8 characters
key.description: Whether to show planet symbols as their UTF-8 representation. Uses less memory, but not all system fonts have them defined. If a planet (like most dwarves) don’t have a character representation, an image fallback will be used.

key.name: aspects-char
key.summary: Display aspect symbols as UTF-8 characters
key.description: Whether to show aspect symbols as their UTF-8 representation. Uses less memory, but not all system fonts have them defined. If an aspect don’t have a character representation, an image fallback will be used.

key.name: default-house-system
key.description: The house system to use by default in new charts

key.name: maximized
key.description: Whether a new window should open maximized.

key.name: width
key.description: The width of newly created windows.

key.name: height
key.description: The height of newly created windows.

key.name: classic-only
key.description: Use the classical view: planets only between Sun and Saturn, only Ptolemaic aspects, no antiscia.
